mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rn, a.* from CDPRJ.T_GKMT_BERTHS a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) WHERE rn > #{start}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rn, b.* from CDPRJ.T_GKMT_BERTHS b LEFT JOIN CDPRJ.T_GKMT_ENTERPRISES e on e.ENTERPRISE_NO=b.ENTERPRISE_NO WHERE (e.ENTERPRISE_NAME like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{gkqy},'%')) OR e.ENTERPRISE_NAME like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{mtdw},'%'))) AND b.REPORT_YEAR >= #{startDate} AND b.REPORT_YEAR <= #{endDate} AND ROWNUM <= #{end}) WHERE rn > #{start}

select '全省泊位表' AS name, '共计' AS second_name, count(DISTINCT PORTREGION_NO) as second_value, '增加' as third_name, COUNT(ADD_REPORT_PERIOD) as third_value, '报废' as fourth_name, COUNT(CASE WHEN DISCARD_REPORT_PERIOD=0 then null else DISCARD_REPORT_PERIOD END) as fourth_value from CDPRJ.T_GKMT_BERTHS WHERE REPORT_YEAR= #{year}

SELECT TO_CHAR(b.INSERT_DATE,'yyyymm') as time, COUNT(DISTINCT b.BERTH_NO) as BERTH_NUM, 0 as ADD_NUM, 0 as DISCARD_NUM from CDPRJ.T_GKMT_BERTHS b LEFT JOIN CDPRJ.T_GKMT_ENTERPRISES e on e.ENTERPRISE_NO=b.ENTERPRISE_NO WHERE (e.ENTERPRISE_NAME like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{gkqy},'%')) OR e.ENTERPRISE_NAME like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{mtdw},'%'))) AND TO_CHAR(b.INSERT_DATE,'yyyymm') in (#{preMon},#{nowMon}) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.INSERT_DATE,'yyyymm');
